algorithm_technique: Combinatorics with DP on counts, iterating through numbers grouped by k difference.
problem_summary_simple: Count non-empty subsets where no two elements have an absolute difference of k.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a frequency map and dynamic programming on counts grouped by modulo k to count valid subsets.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by considering numbers based on their remainder when divided by k.
Dynamic programming can be applied to count subsets within each remainder group.
The final count is derived by multiplying counts from independent groups and subtracting the empty set.
